assessmentItem.title: Find an angle in a scalene triangle, given the three sides

itemBody.p: In triangle ABC, side a= , side b = and side c=. Find angle in degrees.

div.p: Enter your answer to 2 decimal places.

div.feedbackInline: You have entered the value of cos(); you need to take use the inverse sine function to find the angle.
You have entered the value of the wrong angle; the question asks for angle .; you need to take use the inverse sine function to find the angle.
You seem to have your calculator set to use radians.
